data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: By examining the geological record, we can observe that there have been many fluctuations in climate in the earth's history. This ____ is ____ used ____ climate ____ deniers ____ support ____ claim ____ global ____ is ____ a man-made phenomenon. However, it ____ more ____ that ____ actions ____ mankind ____ irreparably ____ the ____ environment. Both stances are labeled as hypotheses, although one is exceedingly more likely than the other.
data.partBlankContent: By examining the geological record, we can observe that there have been many fluctuations in climate in the earth's history. This fa__ is of___ used b_ climate cha___ deniers t_ support th___ claim th__ global war____ is n__ a man-made phenomenon. However, it i_ more prob____ that t__ actions o_ mankind ha__ irreparably impa____ the glo___ environment. Both stances are labeled as hypotheses, although one is exceedingly more likely than the other.
data.answer: 通过研究地质记录，我们可以观察到，在地球的历史上，气候曾多次波动。否认气候变化的人经常用这个事实来支持他们的主张，即全球变暖不是人为现象。然而，更有可能的是，人类的行动已经不可挽回地影响了全球环境。这两种立场都被称为假设，尽管其中一种可能性比另一种更大。
